name: Just A Bunch Of Tanks
description:
Arm yourself with your trusty tank and prepare for battle as you battle against enemy tanks in six bite-sized, action-puzzle levels. Your goal? It’s simple: take out the enemy tanks as they come at you. Avoid their bullets, as well as cover fire from their turrets, as you weave your way around three different biomes, all with different obstacles and layouts. Oh, and in case you didn’t realize: yup, there are a lot of tanks.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space - Shoot

Eliminate all enemy tanks while avoiding getting shot yourself
